title: My financial career
creator_credit: Gerald Potterton, Colin Low, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated cartoon film from Stephen Leacock’s witty account of a young man’s first brush with banking. When he goes to make his deposit he is so overawed by the institution that nothing he intends to say comes out right. (Awards: Oscar nomination, Hollywood; San Francisco; New York)
